languages.text: {n}Префект тяжело вздыхает.{/n} "Не стоило даже пытаться вас слушать, Вольный Торговец..." {n}Она кивает арбитрам, явно приглашая их сопроводить вас на место обвиняемого.{/n}
{n}The prefect sighs heavily.{/n} "I shouldn't have even tried to hear you out, Rogue Trader..." {n}She gives a nod to the Arbitrators, signalling them to escort you to the accused's stand.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Префект тяжело вздыхает.{/n} "Не стоило даже пытаться вас слушать, Вольный Торговец..." {n}Она кивает арбитрам, явно приглашая их сопроводить вас на место обвиняемого.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Präfektin seufzt schwer.{/n} "Ich hätte Euch gar nicht erst anhören sollen, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}." {n}Sie nickt den Arbitratoren zu, um ihnen zu signalisieren, dich zur Anklagebank zu begleiten.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect sighs heavily.{/n} "I shouldn't have even tried to hear you out, Rogue Trader..." {n}She gives a nod to the Arbitrators, signalling them to escort you to the accused's stand.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Präfektin seufzt schwer.{/n} "Ich hätte Euch gar nicht erst anhören sollen, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}." {n}Sie nickt den Arbitratoren zu, um ihnen zu signalisieren, dich zur Anklagebank zu begleiten.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La préfète pousse un long soupir.{/n} « J'ignore pourquoi j'ai pris la peine de vous parler, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}... » {n}Elle adresse un signe de tête aux arbitrators pour leur ordonner de vous conduire au banc des accusés.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect sighs heavily.{/n} "I shouldn't have even tried to hear you out, Rogue Trader..." {n}She gives a nod to the Arbitrators, signalling them to escort you to the accused's stand.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La préfète pousse un long soupir.{/n} « J'ignore pourquoi j'ai pris la peine de vous parler, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}... » {n}Elle adresse un signe de tête aux arbitrators pour leur ordonner de vous conduire au banc des accusés.{/n}

languages.text: {n}行政官重重地叹了口气。{/n}“我竟然真的打算听你有什么话要说，行商浪人……”{n}她向周围的法务官点头示意，让他们将你带到被告席。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect sighs heavily.{/n} "I shouldn't have even tried to hear you out, Rogue Trader..." {n}She gives a nod to the Arbitrators, signalling them to escort you to the accused's stand.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}行政官重重地叹了口气。{/n}“我竟然真的打算听你有什么话要说，行商浪人……”{n}她向周围的法务官点头示意，让他们将你带到被告席。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La prefecta suspira profundamente.{/n} «Ni siquiera debería haberme molestado en intentar escucharle, Comerciante Independiente...». {n}Asiente en dirección a los Arbitrator, indicándoles que te escolten al puesto de los acusados.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect sighs heavily.{/n} "I shouldn't have even tried to hear you out, Rogue Trader..." {n}She gives a nod to the Arbitrators, signalling them to escort you to the accused's stand.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La prefecta suspira profundamente.{/n} «Ni siquiera debería haberme molestado en intentar escucharle, Comerciante Independiente...». {n}Asiente en dirección a los Arbitrator, indicándoles que te escolten al puesto de los acusados.{/n}

languages.text: {n}総監は深いため息をつく。{/n}「ローグトレーダー、あなたの話など、最初から聞くべきではなかったのかもしれません…」{n}彼女はアービトレイターたちにうなずき、あなたを被告人席に案内するよう合図する。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect sighs heavily.{/n} "I shouldn't have even tried to hear you out, Rogue Trader..." {n}She gives a nod to the Arbitrators, signalling them to escort you to the accused's stand.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}総監は深いため息をつく。{/n}「ローグトレーダー、あなたの話など、最初から聞くべきではなかったのかもしれません…」{n}彼女はアービトレイターたちにうなずき、あなたを被告人席に案内するよう合図する。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Prefekt, derin bir iç çekiyor.{/n} "Sizi dinlemeye tenezzül bile etmemeliydim Hür Tacir..." {n}Yargıcılara başıyla işaret verip seni sanık kürsüsüne götürmelerini söylüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect sighs heavily.{/n} "I shouldn't have even tried to hear you out, Rogue Trader..." {n}She gives a nod to the Arbitrators, signalling them to escort you to the accused's stand.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Prefekt derin bir iç çeker.{/n} "Sizi dinlemeye tenezzül bile etmemeliydim Hür Tacir..." {n}Yargıcılara başıyla işaret edip seni sanık kürsüsüne götürmelerini söylüyor.{/n}
